title: Prediction of intra-abdominal injury using natural language processing of electronic medical record data

abstract: Background This study aimed to use natural language processing to predict the presence of intra-abdominal injury using unstructured data from electronic medical records. Methods This was a random-sample retrospective observational cohort …
